name: Galaxy-Eyes Alternative Photon Dragon
text:
Cannot be Normal Summon/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand or GY) by revealing 1 Level 8 "Galaxy" monster in your hand. You can only Special Summon "Galaxy-Eyes Alternative Photon Dragon" once per turn this way. Once per turn, you can target 1 monster you control; it becomes Level 8. An Xyz Monster that has this card  as an Xyz Material gains this effect: 
 ‚óè Once per turn: You can double this card's ATK, and if you do, you cannot attack with other monsters this turn, except this card.
